commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: And there's Draisaitl laying the body on Forsling in the corner! He's letting the Panthers know they're in for a battle tonight.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: No question. Edmonton isn't just going to rely on skill. They're going to play it tough.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: That's the kind of physicality they'll need if they want to slow down that high-octane Florida offense. Make them earn every inch.
